phrs.translation: 门帘盒, 窗帘盒, 狭长门框, 窗帘盒子
平板幔, 窗帘盒式幔

sentences.sentence: Table, chairs , bed, doors, bed castors, locks & keys, window rubber lining, curtain rods, curtain pelmet, door stoppers, frames, hinges & closer, glass top & window frames.
sentences.translation: 桌子、椅子、床脚、锁和钥匙，橡皮窗封条、窗帘、窗帘装饰盒、门阻、门框、铰链和闭门器、窗框等。
